name: Dragon Ball Z: Run!
description:
WORKS BETTER DOWNLOADING THE GAME // 

FUNCIONA MEJOR DESCARGANDO EL JUEGO//

Description:

On this game you will have to run as Gohan equipped like Goku, including the magic staff and Kinton, his inseparable cloud.

Over Kinton you will have to run , dodge obstacles through the path of the snake and get as many coins as possible. It´s my first game, so enjoy!

Notes:

- WebGL conversion is awful, so really, download it to get a better experience.

-move with WASD controls and jump with SPACEBAR.

For any questions, Leave a comment!
